subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Butler broke Michael Jordan’s team record for points in a half, scoring 40 of his 42 after the break to lead Chicago over the Toronto Raptors, 115-113, on Sunday.
snippet: Butler broke Michael Jordan’s team record for points in a half, scoring 40 of his 42 after the break to lead Chicago over the Toronto Raptors, 115-113, on Sunday.
